thread.title: We are in a correction, says Laurie Kamhi of LCK Wealth Management at High Tower

title: We are in a correction, says Laurie Kamhi of LCK Wealth Management at High Tower
text:
We are in a correction, says Laurie Kamhi of LCK Wealth Management at High Tower   03:42 
Investors have to get used to a market roller-coaster, says Laurie Kamhi, managing director at Wealth Management at High Tower. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Investors have to get used to a market roller-coaster, says Laurie Kamhi, managing director at Wealth Management at High Tower. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sxOnb8
